basicInfo.name: Kris
basicInfo.flavor: Kris the Dark Conqueror has become the Ruler of Purgatory. He is preparing to invade Terra.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 20% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 20% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Dark Slash
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 305% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a barrier equal to 135% of Physical Attack upon defeating an enemy with this skill. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 370% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Death chance becomes 60%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 30% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Dark Whispers
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 25% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a barrier equal to 135% of Physical Attack upon defeating an enemy with this skill. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Death chance becomes 30%.

Passive.name: Soul Drain
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 20% of the caster's Physical Attack when an enemy falls in battle.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Turns: Immortality duration becomes 3 turn(s).
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Skill Cooldown Reset upon gaining Immortality.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rudy, Knight of Light title, subordinates, seaweed, kelp, grapes, oranges, strength, skill, order, well forged weapons
profile.dislikes: The weak, weak nobles, smoked food, disorder, old-fashioned ideas
profile.story: An elite knight of Terra Kingdom from a noble family. He's gone through a lifetime of harsh training to become one of the strongest knights in the kingdom alongside Rudy.

basicInfo.name: Kris
basicInfo.flavor: Rather than being consumed by demonic power, Kris seized control of it. Demons now revere him and call him the \"Dark Conqueror.\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Dark Slash
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 275% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a barrier equal to 125% of Physical Attack upon defeating an enemy with this skill. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 275% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Dark Whispers
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 25% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a barrier equal to 125% of Physical Attack upon defeating an enemy with this skill. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Soul Drain
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 145% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 18% of the caster's Physical Attack when an enemy falls in battle.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 145% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Kris
basicInfo.flavor: Kris, once a knight that served the light alongside Rudy, has turned to demonic power after losing the Knight of Light title to him.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy

 - Self

 - Self
